name: TAL: Wizard's Adventures
description:
TAL: Wizard's Adventures - adventure about young wizard’s apprentice. With your help, Phineas has to go through burdens and trials for achievement one main goal. Our hero wants to gain true wizard attribute - the magic hat.
Confrontation powerful enemies, puzzles solving, many magic tricks, which would help you in this not easy adventure, are waiting for you in these unique and amazing worlds. Help Phineas to end his tuition and get desired artifact.

The main features:

  • 4 worlds, each with unique traps
  • Magic powers, which would help to overcome obstacles
  • Original soundtrack
  • Steam Achievements
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by Erwarda Savitnaag.
